relation: Oz's take on the "Manliest Ness Ever" idea.
One of the sentry robots employed by Pokey in the Monotoli Building. Another unfinished image, but I haven't worked on it in years and always liked how it was progressing.
One of the PigTower things from EB64. I so wish that they'd have made it to M3.
One of the many reasons why the first game in the series was odd.
